title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building enterprise-grade Agentic AI factory (PEX302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建企业级代理式AI工厂 (PEX302)
abstract: Learn to build enterprise-scale AI systems using the new Agentic AI Factory framework, a comprehensive toolkit with pre-built agent blueprints and proven integration patterns. This deep-dive session demonstrates how to orchestrate multiple AI agents with AWS Strands Agents and Amazon Bedrock, implement secure communications via A2A and MCP protocols, and leverage the framework's knowledge management systems. Through practical demonstrations and architectural discussions, you will gain actionable insights to rapidly develop and deploy production-ready agentic AI solutions, transforming ideas into enterprise-grade systems using our proven framework and toolkit.
abstract_cn: 学习使用全新的 Agentic AI Factory 框架构建企业级 AI 系统，这是一个综合工具包，包含预构建的代理蓝图和经过验证的集成模式。本深度会议演示如何使用 AWS Strands Agents 和 Amazon Bedrock 编排多个 AI 代理，通过 A2A 和 MCP 协议实现安全通信，并利用框架的知识管理系统。通过实际演示和架构讨论，您将获得可操作的见解，以快速开发和部署生产就绪的代理式 AI 解决方案，使用我们经过验证的框架和工具包将想法转化为企业级系统。
